A '''diorite wall''' is a [[diorite]] variant of a [[wall]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Diorite walls can be mined using any [[pickaxe]]. If mined without a pickaxe, they drop nothing.

{{Breaking row|Diorite Wall|Pickaxe|Wood|horizontal=1}}

=== Natural generation ===
Diorite walls may generate in [[snowy tundra]] [[village]]s.
